original: 初平元年（190年），諸侯以討董為名起兵，推袁紹為盟主。但諸侯畏於飛將呂布，唯曹操、孫堅二人，以弱小攻彊兵。
text: In the first year of Chuping (190 years), the princes raised troops in the name of Dong Dong, and Yuan Shao was promoted as the leader. But the princes were afraid of flying general Lu Bu, only Cao Cao and Sun Jian, attacking the strong with weak.
